state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, head north. And then, attempt to go north. And then, take a trip north. With that over with, attempt to take a trip east. Once you get through with that, take a trip east. Then, go north. If you can do that, move west. Then, go to the west. And then, try to travel south. And then, travel west. Then, make an effort to head south. And then, take a trip south. Then, take a trip west. Then, venture south. Then, lift the coin from the floor of the lounge. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Closet =- You are in a closet. A normal kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Closet =-0/1
